import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../GlobalState' import Menu from './icon/menu.svg' import Close from './icon/close.svg' import Cart from './icon/cart.svg' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Header() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [isLogged, setIsLogged] = state.userAPI.isLogged const [isAdmin, setIsAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const [cart] = state.userAPI.cart const logoutUser = async () =>{ await axios.get('/user/logout') localStorage.clear() setIsAdmin(false) setIsLogged(false) } const adminRouter = () =>{ return( <>
  • Create Product
  • Categories
    • ) } const loggedRouter = () =>{ return( <>
  • History
  • Logout
    • ) } return (

    {isAdmin ? 'Admin' : 'E-COMMERCE'}

    • {isAdmin ? 'Products' : 'Shop'}
      • {isAdmin && adminRouter()} { isLogged ? loggedRouter() :
    • Login & Register
      • }
    { isAdmin ? '' :
    {cart}
    }
    ) } export default Header
